changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet de piloter les modules: This plugin allows you to control Wattlet's Wattcubes modules via the Wattcube Web
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it, then configure the IP address of the Wattcube Web
index.md.La synchronisation des équipements Wattl: The synchronization of Wattlets equipment is accessible from the Plugins menu
index.md.Une fois que vous cliquez sur l'un d'eux: Once you click on one of them, you get
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.nom de votre équipement Wattlet sur le d: name of your Wattlet equipment on the dashboard
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.Ainsi que les informations suivantes: As well as the following information
index.md.Les commandes sont automatiquement créée: Orders are automatically created, there is no need to add them manually
index.md.Afin de récupérer les retours d'états, i: In order to retrieve status returns, it is necessary to configure push notifications in the Wattcube Web
index.md.Dans l'interface du Wattcube Web, se ren: In the Wattcube Web interface, go to the "Preferences" tab then menu "Customization of the order
index.md.Dans la zone \"Notification PUSH\", entr: In the "PUSH Notification" area, enter the Jeedom address in the form
index.md.IP\\_JEEDOM\/plugins\/wattlet\/core\/php: IP\_JEEDOM / plugins / wattlet / core / php / jeeWattlet.php
